DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this investigational study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (a specific type of diabetes).
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-024)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 104 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are at least 18 years of age and not older than 78 with type 2 diabetes mellitus
